main event: Two airmen at Brooks Air Force Base observed a white disc traveling at high altitude on 1 August 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as a white disc with no protuberances,The sighting lasted for approximately 1 to 1.5 minutes,The object moved silently at a high speed and altitude,The direction of the object's travel was southeasterly,There was no meteorological explanation for the sighting.
witness description: A/1C John R. Holl and A/2C John E. Daniel from the 5th Sec, USAFS
